div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2324 Montemolin, near Marchena, 50 km. E of Seville, before 1871 Burial: 237-218 B.C. (Villaronga) Contents: 2+ AR Hispano-Punic: 1 tridr. (as Robinson 6) 1 didr. (as R. 7) Disposition: Gago Coll., now Seville (Ayun- tamiento) â€ Delgado, MAE I, p. 119 and fig. Villaronga, MHC (forthcoming)
